caracteristicas: The Samsung Galaxy S6 is powered by 1.5GHz octa-core Samsung Exynos 7420 processor and it comes with 3GB of RAM. The phone packs 32GB of internal storage cannot be expanded.
The Nokia Lumia 1520 is powered by 2.2GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 800
The Motorola Google Nexus 6 is powered by 2.7GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 805
It comes with 1GB of RAM. The phone packs 16GB of internal storage cannot be expanded.
